a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate in intrastate conflicts, World, 1946 to 2024

Deaths of combatants and civilians due to fighting, per 100,000 people. Included are
intrastate conflicts
that
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program (2025) and other sources
Note: 'Best' estimates as identified by UCDP.
